assembler.name: Assembler
assembler.description:
Crafts two parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

awesome-shop.name: AWESOME Shop
awesome-shop.description:
Redeem your FICSIT Coupons here! 
For those employees going the extra kilometer we have set aside special bonus milestones and rewards! Get your Coupons in the AWESOME Sink program now!

*No refunds possible.

awesome-sink.name: AWESOME Sink
awesome-sink.description:
Got excess resources? Fear not, for FICSIT does not waste! The newly developed AWESOME Sink turns any useful part straight into research data, as fast as you can supply it! 
Participating empolyees will be compensated with Coupons to be spend at the AWESOME Shop.

biomass-burner.name: Biomass Burner
biomass-burner.description:
Burns various forms of biomass to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has no input and must therefore be fed biomass manually.

coal-generator.name: Coal Generator
coal-generator.description:
Burns coal to generate electricity for your power grid.
Has an input so feeding coal can be automated.

constructor.name: Constructor
constructor.description:
Crafts one part into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

conveyor-belt.name: Conveyor Belt
conveyor-belt.description: Transports up to 60 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

conveyor-belt-mk2.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.2
conveyor-belt-mk2.description: Transports up to 120 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

conveyor-belt-mk3.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.3
conveyor-belt-mk3.description: Transports up to 270 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

conveyor-belt-mk4.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.4
conveyor-belt-mk4.description: Transports up to 480 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

conveyor-belt-mk5.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.5
conveyor-belt-mk5.description: Transports up to 780 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

conveyor-lift.name: Conveyor Lift
conveyor-lift.description: Transports up to 60 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

conveyor-lift-mk2.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.2
conveyor-lift-mk2.description: Transports up to 120 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

conveyor-lift-mk3.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.3
conveyor-lift-mk3.description: Transports up to 270 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

conveyor-lift-mk4.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.4
conveyor-lift-mk4.description: Transports up to 480 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

conveyor-lift-mk5.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.5
conveyor-lift-mk5.description: Transports up to 780 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

conveyor-merger.name: Conveyor Merger
conveyor-merger.description: Merges up to three conveyor belts into one.

conveyor-pole.name: Conveyor Pole
conveyor-pole.description:
Can be used as a connection for conveyor belts. The height of the pole can be adjusted.
Useful to route conveyor belts in a more controlled manner and over long distances.

conveyor-pole-stackable.name: Conveyor Pole Stackable
conveyor-pole-stackable.description: Conveyor pole with fixed size that is stackable

conveyor-splitter.name: Conveyor Splitter
conveyor-splitter.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
Useful to move parts and resources from oversaturated conveyor belts.

conveyor-wall-mount.name: Conveyor Wall Mount
conveyor-wall-mount.description:
Can be attached to walls and is used as a connection for conveyor belts.
Useful to route conveyor belts in a more controlled manner and over long distances.

corner-ramp-down-8m-x-1m.name: Corner Ramp Down 8m x 1m
corner-ramp-down-8m-x-1m.description: The Ramps exist to make it easier to get up on Floors, either for vehicles or you. Height: 2

corner-ramp-down-8m-x-2m.name: Corner Ramp Down 8m x 2m
corner-ramp-down-8m-x-2m.description: The Ramps exist to make it easier to get up on Floors, either for vehicles or you. Height: 2

corner-ramp-down-8m-x-4m.name: Corner Ramp Down 8m x 4m
corner-ramp-down-8m-x-4m.description: The Ramps exist to make it easier to get up on Floors, either for vehicles or you. Height: 4

corner-ramp-up-8m-x-1m.name: Corner Ramp Up 8m x 1m
corner-ramp-up-8m-x-1m.description: The Ramps exist to make it easier to get up on Floors, either for vehicles or you. Height: 2

corner-ramp-up-8m-x-2m.name: Corner Ramp Up 8m x 2m
corner-ramp-up-8m-x-2m.description: The Ramps exist to make it easier to get up on Floors, either for vehicles or you. Height: 2

corner-ramp-up-8m-x-4m.name: Corner Ramp Up 8m x 4m
corner-ramp-up-8m-x-4m.description: The Ramps exist to make it easier to get up on Floors, either for vehicles or you. Height: 2

craft-bench.name: Craft Bench
craft-bench.description:
Allows you to manually craft a large range of different parts. 
These parts can then be used in construction of different factory buildings, vehicles and equipment.

double-ramp-8m-x-2m.name: Double Ramp 8m x 2m
double-ramp-8m-x-2m.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

double-ramp-8m-x-4m.name: Double Ramp 8m x 4m
double-ramp-8m-x-4m.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

double-ramp-8m-x-8m.name: Double Ramp 8m x 8m
double-ramp-8m-x-8m.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

double-sided-wall-power-pole.name: Double-sided Wall Power Pole
double-sided-wall-power-pole.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall. Has one connector on each side of the wall.

Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

double-sided-wall-power-pole-mk2.name: Double-sided Wall Power Pole Mk.2
double-sided-wall-power-pole-mk2.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall. Has one connector on each side of the wall.

Can handle up to 7 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

double-sided-wall-power-pole-mk3.name: Double-sided Wall Power Pole Mk.3
double-sided-wall-power-pole-mk3.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall. Has one connector on each side of the wall.

Can handle up to 10 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

empty-platform.name: Empty Platform
empty-platform.description: An empty train platform for when you need to create some empty space.

fence.name: Fence
fence.description: The Fence can be built on the edges of floors to prevent you from falling off.

fluid-freight-platform.name: Fluid Freight Platform
fluid-freight-platform.description:
As Freight Cars stop this they will either unload or load their goods, depending on what you've set it to.
The Freight Platform snaps to Railway, each other and Train Stations.

foundation-8m-x-1m.name: Foundation 8m x 1m
foundation-8m-x-1m.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

foundation-8m-x-2m.name: Foundation 8m x 2m
foundation-8m-x-2m.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

foundation-8m-x-4m.name: Foundation 8m x 4m
foundation-8m-x-4m.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

foundation-frame.name: Foundation Frame
foundation-frame.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

foundry.name: Foundry
foundry.description:
Smelts two resources into alloy ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore into it with a conveyor belt connected to the inputs. The produced ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

freight-platform.name: Freight Platform
freight-platform.description:
As Freight Cars stop this they will either unload or load their goods, depending on what you've set it to.
The Freight Platform snaps to Railway, each other and Train Stations.

fuel-generator.name: Fuel Generator
fuel-generator.description:
Consumes Fuel to generate electricity for your power grid.
Has an input so feeding Fuel can be automated.

gate-8m-x-4m.name: Gate 8m x 4m
gate-8m-x-4m.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
Allows human beings to pass through walls.

geo-thermal-generator.name: Geo Thermal Generator
geo-thermal-generator.description:
Can only be built on geyser nodes.
Generates electricity for your power grid.
Does not require any resources to be input.

glass-foundation-8m-x-1m.name: Glass Foundation 8m x 1m
glass-foundation-8m-x-1m.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

hyper-tube.name: Hyper Tube
hyper-tube.description:
Tubes for transporting Ficsit employees.
Require a Hyper Tube Entrance to function and be entered.

hyper-tube-entrance.name: Hyper Tube Entrance
hyper-tube-entrance.description: Used to enter and power a Hyper Tube.

hyper-tube-support.name: Hyper Tube Support
hyper-tube-support.description: Supports for Hyper Tubes to allow for longer distances.

hyper-tube-wall-hole.name: Hyper Tube Wall Hole
hyper-tube-wall-hole.description: Can be attached to walls to allow Hyper Tubes to pass through them.

hyper-tube-wall-support.name: Hyper Tube Wall Support
hyper-tube-wall-support.description:
Can be attached to walls. 
Supports for Hyper Tubes to allow for longer distances.

industrial-fluid-buffer-1.name: Industrial Fluid Buffer
industrial-fluid-buffer-1.description:
Can contain up to 300m3 of fluid.
Has an in and output for pipes.

industrial-fluid-buffer-2.name: Industrial Fluid Buffer
industrial-fluid-buffer-2.description:
Can contain up to 1200m3 of fluid.
Has an in and output for pipes.

industrial-storage-container.name: Industrial Storage Container
industrial-storage-container.description:
Contains 48 slots for storing large amounts of items.
Has two inputs and outputs for conveyor belts.

inner-corner-quarter-pipe.name: Inner-Corner Quarter Pipe
inner-corner-quarter-pipe.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

inverted-inner-corner-quarter-pipe.name: Inverted Inner-Corner Quarter Pipe
inverted-inner-corner-quarter-pipe.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

inverted-outer-corner-quarter-pipe.name: Inverted Outer-Corner Quarter Pipe
inverted-outer-corner-quarter-pipe.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

inverted-quarter-pipe.name: Inverted Quarter Pipe
inverted-quarter-pipe.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

inverted-ramp-8m-x-1m.name: Inverted Ramp 8m x 1m
inverted-ramp-8m-x-1m.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

inverted-ramp-8m-x-2m.name: Inverted Ramp 8m x 2m
inverted-ramp-8m-x-2m.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

inverted-ramp-8m-x-4m.name: Inverted Ramp 8m x 4m
inverted-ramp-8m-x-4m.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

inverted-ramp-corner-8m-x-1m.name: Inverted Ramp Corner 8m x 1m
inverted-ramp-corner-8m-x-1m.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

inverted-ramp-corner-8m-x-2m.name: Inverted Ramp Corner 8m x 2m
inverted-ramp-corner-8m-x-2m.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

inverted-ramp-corner-8m-x-4m.name: Inverted Ramp Corner 8m x 4m
inverted-ramp-corner-8m-x-4m.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

jump-pad.name: Jump Pad
jump-pad.description:
Propels you upwards through the air.
Make sure you land softly.

lookout-tower.name: Lookout Tower
lookout-tower.description: Provides a good OVERVIEW useful for building.

mam.name: M.A.M.
mam.description:
The Molecular Analysis Machine is used to break down matter for analysis.
R&D will assist Pioneers through the M.A.M to turn any valuable data into usable research options.

manufacturer.name: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description:
Crafts three or four parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

miner-mk1.name: Miner Mk.1
miner-mk1.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 60 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

miner-mk2.name: Miner Mk.2
miner-mk2.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 120 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

miner-mk3.name: Miner Mk.3
miner-mk3.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 240 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

nuclear-power-plant.name: Nuclear Power Plant
nuclear-power-plant.description:
Consumes Nuclear Fuel Rods and Water to produce power.
Has a conveyor belt and pipeline input so loading can be automated.  
Produces Nuclear Waste, which is extracted from the conveyor belt output.

oil-extractor.name: Oil Extractor
oil-extractor.description:
Normal extraction rate: 120m3 oil per minute.
Default pressure: 10, allowing a 10 meter vertical rise of fluids.

Extracts Crude Oil from a Crude Oil node it is build on. Extraction rates depend on node purity.
Outputs all extracted Crude Oil from the pipe output connection.

outer-corner-quarter-pipe.name: Outer-Corner Quarter Pipe
outer-corner-quarter-pipe.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

personal-storage-box.name: Personal Storage Box
personal-storage-box.description: Contains 25 slots for storing large amounts of items.

pillar-base.name: Pillar Base
pillar-base.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

pillar-middle.name: Pillar Middle
pillar-middle.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

pillar-top.name: Pillar Top
pillar-top.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

pipeline.name: Pipeline
pipeline.description:
Outside indicators show volume, flow rate and direction.
Transports up to 300m3 of fluid per minute.
Used to transport fluids.

pipeline-junction-cross.name: Pipeline Junction Cross
pipeline-junction-cross.description: Can be attached to a pipeline to split it 4-way.

pipeline-pump.name: Pipeline Pump
pipeline-pump.description:
Applies 20 pressure, allowing a 20 meter vertical rise of fluids.
Outputs fluids at 300m3 per minute.

Can be attached to a pipeline to apply additional pressure.
Useful for overcoming verticality and balancing out throughput.

pipeline-support.name: Pipeline Support
pipeline-support.description:
Can be used as a connection for pipelines. The height of the support can be adjusted.
Useful to route pipelines in a more controlled manner and over long distances.

pipeline-wall-hole.name: Pipeline Wall Hole
pipeline-wall-hole.description: Can be attached to walls, allowing Pipelines to pass through them.

pipeline-wall-support.name: Pipeline Wall Support
pipeline-wall-support.description:
Can be attached to walls.
Used to connect Pipelines over longer distances.

power-line.name: Power Line
power-line.description: Used to connect Power Poles, Power Generators and Factory buildings.

power-pole.name: Power Pole
power-pole.description:
Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

power-pole-mk2.name: Power Pole Mk.2
power-pole-mk2.description:
Can handle up to 7 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

power-pole-mk3.name: Power Pole Mk.3
power-pole-mk3.description:
Can handle up to 10 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

programmable-splitter.name: Programmable Splitter
programmable-splitter.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
You can set rules for each output to decide exactly where each part should go.

quarter-pipe.name: Quarter Pipe
quarter-pipe.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

railway.name: Railway
railway.description:
Used to transport trains in a reliable and fast manner.
Has a wide turn angle so make sure to plan it out properly.

ramp-8m-x-1m.name: Ramp 8m x 1m
ramp-8m-x-1m.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

ramp-8m-x-2m.name: Ramp 8m x 2m
ramp-8m-x-2m.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

ramp-8m-x-4m.name: Ramp 8m x 4m
ramp-8m-x-4m.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

refinery.name: Refinery
refinery.description:
Refines fluids or solids into more usable parts.

Has a pipe and conveyor belt output to handle potential by-products.

smart-splitter.name: Smart Splitter
smart-splitter.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
You can set a rule for which part should go to the left and which part should go to the right.

smelter.name: Smelter
smelter.description:
Smelts ore into ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

space-elevator.name: Space Elevator
space-elevator.description:
Funnel resources to complete Project Assembly.
Completing stages here allows you to unlock later tiers of milestones in the HUB.

stackable-pipeline-support.name: Stackable Pipeline Support
stackable-pipeline-support.description: Support for pipelines. Can be stacked on other stackable supports.

stairs.name: Stairs
stairs.description: The Stairs allow you to move to the upper floors of your buildings. Height: 4

stairs-left.name: Stairs Left
stairs-left.description:
Snaps to foundations.
Makes it easier to get to other floors of your structures.

stairs-right.name: Stairs Right
stairs-right.description:
Snaps to foundations.
Makes it easier to get to other floors of your structures.

storage-container.name: Storage Container
storage-container.description:
Contains 24 slots for storing large amounts of items.
Has an input and output for conveyor belts.

the-hub.name: The HUB
the-hub.description: The heart of your factory. This is where you complete FICSIT milestones to unlock additional blueprints of buildings, vehicles, parts, equipment etc.

tilted-jump-pad.name: Tilted Jump Pad
tilted-jump-pad.description:
Propels you forwards through the air.
Make sure you land softly.

train-station.name: Train Station
train-station.description:
Locomotives can be set to drive to and stop at the Train Station.
You can connect power to the train station to power up the trains on the railway as well as transport the power to other stations.

truck-station.name: Truck Station
truck-station.description:
Either send or receive resources to vehicles. Has an inventory with 48 slots.
Transfers up to 120 stacks per minute to/from docked vehicle. 
Always refuels vehicles if it has access to a matching fuel type..

u-jelly-landing-pad.name: U-Jelly Landing Pad
u-jelly-landing-pad.description:
Generates a speed dampening jelly.
Guarantees a soft landing.

walkway-crossing.name: Walkway Crossing
walkway-crossing.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

walkway-ramp.name: Walkway Ramp
walkway-ramp.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

walkway-straight.name: Walkway Straight
walkway-straight.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

walkway-t-crossing.name: Walkway T-Crossing
walkway-t-crossing.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

walkway-turn.name: Walkway Turn
walkway-turn.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

wall-8m-x-4m-1.name: Wall 8m x 4m
wall-8m-x-4m-1.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
Useful for building multi-floor structures.

wall-8m-x-4m-2.name: Wall 8m x 4m
wall-8m-x-4m-2.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
Useful for building multi-floor structures.

wall-conveyor-perpendicular-1.name: Wall Conveyor Perpendicular
wall-conveyor-perpendicular-1.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 1 conveyor belt connection perpendicular to the wall.
Height: 4

wall-conveyor-perpendicular-2.name: Wall Conveyor Perpendicular
wall-conveyor-perpendicular-2.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 1 conveyor belt connection perpendicular to the wall.
Height: 4

wall-conveyor-x1-1.name: Wall Conveyor x1
wall-conveyor-x1-1.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 1 conveyor belt connection.
Height: 4

wall-conveyor-x1-2.name: Wall Conveyor x1
wall-conveyor-x1-2.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 1 conveyor belt connection.
Height: 4

wall-conveyor-x2-1.name: Wall Conveyor x2
wall-conveyor-x2-1.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 2 conveyor belt connections.
Height: 4

wall-conveyor-x2-2.name: Wall Conveyor x2
wall-conveyor-x2-2.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 2 conveyor belt connections.
Height: 4

wall-conveyor-x3-1.name: Wall Conveyor x3
wall-conveyor-x3-1.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 3 conveyor belt connections.
Height: 4

wall-conveyor-x3-2.name: Wall Conveyor x3
wall-conveyor-x3-2.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 3 conveyor belt connections.
Height: 4

wall-door-center-1.name: Wall Door Center
wall-door-center-1.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

wall-door-center-2.name: Wall Door Center
wall-door-center-2.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

wall-door-left-1.name: Wall Door Left
wall-door-left-1.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

wall-door-left-2.name: Wall Door Left
wall-door-left-2.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

wall-door-right-1.name: Wall Door Right
wall-door-right-1.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

wall-door-right-2.name: Wall Door Right
wall-door-right-2.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

wall-power-pole.name: Wall Power Pole
wall-power-pole.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall.

Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

wall-power-pole-mk2.name: Wall Power Pole Mk.2
wall-power-pole-mk2.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall.

Can handle up to 7 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

wall-power-pole-mk3.name: Wall Power Pole Mk.3
wall-power-pole-mk3.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall.

Can handle up to 10 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

wall-window-8m-x-4m-01.name: Wall Window 8m x 4m 01
wall-window-8m-x-4m-01.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

wall-window-8m-x-4m-02.name: Wall Window 8m x 4m 02
wall-window-8m-x-4m-02.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

wall-window-8m-x-4m-04.name: Wall Window 8m x 4m 04
wall-window-8m-x-4m-04.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

water-extractor.name: Water Extractor
water-extractor.description:
Default extraction rate: 120m3 water per minute.
Default pressure: 10, allowing a 10 meter vertical rise of fluids.

Extracts water from the body of water it is build on.
Note that the water needs to be deep enough and that rivers do not commonly suffice.

window-8m-x-4m-03.name: Window 8m x 4m 03
window-8m-x-4m-03.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
Allows human beings to see through walls.
